title: Airwheel personal transporter Standing up electric scooter
text: Airwheel personal transporter Standing up electric scooter , 24 September 2015 -- Airwheel electric scooter has its own personalities- creative, capable as well as vigorousAirwheel electric scooter has become an inseparable companion in daily life, and many riders consider Airwheel electric scooter as a beloved and closet friend. In fact, Airwheel self-balancing electric scooter has really reflected some personalities, being creative, capable as well as vigorous. First and foremost, Airwheel electric scooter is extremely creative, establishing a complete new era in the history of scooter riding. Smartly equipped with high-tech fruits, Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter makes ordinary and monotonous riding life interesting and pleasurable. Airwheel supports a different riding format with standing-posture for riders, enabling people try the fresh new riding experience with Airwheel self-balancing scooter. And it is the first time that Airwheel riders realize how creative and pleasing riding life could be. In terms of functionalities, Airwheel self-balancing scooter acts as a capable helper in various aspects of people’s daily life. And Airwheel electric scooter is well recognized for its multiple function roles in commuting, physical exercises, as well as entertainments. It is no exaggeration that Airwheel self-balancing scooter has played an indispensable and crucial role in advancing people’s daily life. After all, Airwheel electric scooter can not only satisfy the basic commuting needs, but also provides huge pleasures to people’s daily life. Anyway, Airwheel has become popular among people due to its powerful and multiple functionalities in people’s daily life. Lat but not least, Airwheel electric scooter gives the sense of energy and strength, especially for those young riders who are likely to try speedy and cross-road riding with Airwheel electric scooters. Truthfully, the premium and brilliant battery performances enables Airwheel enables Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter to be featured by strong momentum as well as endurable speed. Therefore, young riders can enjoy a trilling and passionate Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter riding since they can feel the speed, strength and power from Airwheel riding. Due to the bright personalities that shared by Airwheel electric scooters, many people would love to rider with Airwheel to experience the brighter side of life. Truthfully, every day will become wonderful if we live with passion and strength. About: Established in 2004, Airwheel Technology was initiated by a group of pioneers who took constant adventure to reshape the world with edged technology. With a global view, the U.S.-based enterprise started to build since its establishment R&D centers located in L.A., Beijing, and Changzhou, a marketing center in Beijing and a manufacturing center in Changzhou. As the leader in global portable intelligent transport industry, we have been dedicated to extend the fun and benefit of cutting-edge technology to everywhere in the world. Media contact: Company Name: Airwheel Technology Holding (USA) Co., Ltd Contact Person: Mr Tang Address: 5000 Katy Mills Cir. Unt 745, Katy, TX 77494, USA E-mail:
